comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: Probably the famous 18 Foot Skiffs. There are some modern reconstructions sailing on the Harbour

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Taken from Bennelong Point where Sydney Opera House now is (Fort Macquarie then), judging from the alignment of Fort Denison and Bradleys Head. It's a tremendous action picture of what was then a new sport: www.18footers.com.au/index.php/18ft-skiff-racing/early-18... .
